Review: Wonderful experience with Shatayu Hospital . Dr.  Krishna Mahajan  was a wonderful pediatrician , physician and the staff was always helpful and kind. They ensured I had a smooth prep, and follow-up. I am so glad I chose Shatayu Hospital and would highly recommend to anyone

Doctor is very nice. Very helpful and kind doctor I have ever seen. Not working for money at all. He is very affordable and very talented.

Doctor is up to mark and his diagnosis is very perfect.
